dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HRES 651 IH: Supporting the commemoration of August 14, 2025, as the 90th anniversary of the establishment of Social Security.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bresnahan (for himself, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Lawler, Mr. Nunn of Iowa, Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia, Mr. Kean, and Mr. Fitzpatrick) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: Supporting the commemoration of August 14, 2025, as the 90th anniversary of the establishment of Social Security.

whereas.text: Whereas, on August 14, 1935, the Social Security Act was signed into law, establishing a landmark Federal program to provide economic security for elderly Americans;
Whereas Social Security has contributed to the economic stability and dignity of older Americans for 9 decades; and
Whereas the program remains a vital pillar of Americaâ€™s social safety net and is supported by the hard work and contributions of American workers and employers: Now, therefore, be it

section.text: That the House of Representatives supports the commemoration of the 90th anniversary of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 301 et seq.).
